translation: Among creations I am the beginning, the middle, and the end, O Arjuna; among the sciences, I am the science of the Self; and I am the logic among controversialists.
commentary: 10.32 among creations? Adiá¸¥ the beginning? Inside the end? f and? middle the middle? f and? Eve also? I'm I? Arjuna Or Arjuna? Spirituality the science of the Self? of sciences among sciences? Argument: logic? Let us speak among controversialists? I am I.Commentary I am the metaphysics among all sciences. I am knowledge of the Self among all branches of knowledge. I am the argument of daters. I am
